import React from 'react' import CartItem from './CartItem' import './Cart.css' import Backdrop from '../UI/Backdrop/Backdrop' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCartShopping } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function Cart(props) { const cartItems = props.cartItems.map(item => ) return (
Cart clear
{cartItems}
) }
